about_the_game:
A roguelike in the underwolrd of Egyptian Mythology!

Osiris is a Roguelike Dark Fantasy game that tells the story of a demigod who wants to escape the Egyptian underworld to save his beloved woman who was doomed to lose her soul forever.

The game is a top-down Roguelike with influences from award-winning game mechanics in the same style as Hades and the visual of the Diablo series. With graphics built in the Unreal Engine fully semi-procedural, 4 acts with dozens of enemies and treasures to be collected. Each playthrough is different with the system of random powers that change your abilities uniquely with each new game. The game is 100% developed and is scheduled for release in the second half of this year.

-Play as an immortal Duat hero!
-Receving the seals of the god of egypt.
-Discover the Egyptian HEll unraveling semi procedural scenarios.
-Wield Legendary Weapons and Create Unique Combos.
-Face Merciless Bosses.
-Unleash Super Special Powers with endless ways to upgrade your weapons.
-Evolve your power infinitely in the talent system.
-Find the most secret treasures and use it to get more powerful.
-Bargain with lost legends in the shops , secret papyris and sacrifices altars.
-Each play is completely different with millions of possibile combinations os skills and talents.
-Face even greater challenges with gameplus+.




Gameplay Systems :

Random skills on every turn (never same game)
Infinite possibilities for skill combinations
Semi-procedural random scenarios
Different Weapons and Playstyles
Unique Upgrades and Special Powers
Permanently Talents upgrades and treasures System
Secret items and Characters
Unreal Engine Graphics and Effects



Are you prepared for the ultimatum of the god of Death ?

name: Osiris

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 2520 2.5GHz or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970GTX or ATI Radeon HD4650 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound® compatible sound card（DirectX®9.0c or later）
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 7700 4.2GHz or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060GTX or ATI Radeon HD480 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound® compatible sound card（DirectX®9.0c or later）

short_description: Osiris is a Roguelike Dark Fantasy game that tells the story of a demigod who wants to escape the Egyptian underworld to save his beloved woman who was doomed to lose her soul forever.
